name: Golden Tomb
description:
In this game, we play a character who wants to make a golden tomb for his deceased lover, princess Elisa. Our character fights chickens in difficult dungeons and collects golden eggs falling from them. It is an action game with pixel art graphics. Developed for PC platform with Unity game engine.

We started this project at a 12-hour game jam event "Çırak Atölye Game Jam" organized by ITU Game Design and Development Club on December 25, 2017. The time we had was not enough and the game was unfinished. As usual, we left the game completely after the game jam event. After two and a half years, I decided to return to the project and finish it.

--- Controls ---

You can access the controls of the game and how it is played from the "How To Play" section in the menu.

Directional arrows allow you to move.

The X key allows the character to attack.

The Z key allows the character to use a shield.
